request.description:
Get access token & refresh token

| Param / Variable | Description |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | an unique id |
| secret_key | hardcoded in app (ask backend engineer) |
| platform | ios / android |

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type

header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
header.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

request.description:
Login customer

| Param / Variable | Description |
| ------ | ------ |
| phone | customer phone number |
| code | verification code |

Register new customer

| Param / Variable | Description |
| ------ | ------ |
| phone | customer phone number |
| code | verification code |
| name | customer name |
| email | customer email |
